safetyTips: We are cleaning the van with antibacterial wipes between each stop, using hand sanitizer and only accepting contactless payment.
name: LUNCH BY ZOE
description: Mobile refrigerated sandwich van offering fresh baguettes, sandwiches and salad boxes made daily, along with hot pastries- jumbo sausage rolls and home made pasties - in the onboard oven. We also sell crisps, chocolate, drinks and homemade cakes,  and are able to provide buffet lunches. Order by telephone or email.
